bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Neva Pauline Hough, October 31, 1940

div1.p: Hench thanks Hough for the Lazear family addresses.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Neva Pauline Hough, October 31, 1940
div1.opener:
October 31, 1940
Miss Neva Hough
Secretary to the President
Washington and Jefferson College
Washington, Pennsylvania
My dear Miss Hough:
div1.p:
Thank you very kindly for the Lazear family
addresses. The enclosed request I have sent to Mr.
Brewer directly rather than bother you with it.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
